snippet: The chief of the criminal investigations unit was seized by armed men in the Libyan city, which has been plagued by poor security.
abstract: Police officials in Benghazi, Libya, say they are searching for Capt Abdel-Salam al-Mahdawi, chief of city's criminal investigations unit, after he was seized by armed men; Mahdawi had agreed to identify suspects in killing of former police chief Faraj al-Deirsy.
lead_paragraph: The chief of the criminal investigations unit was seized by armed men in the Libyan city, which has been plagued by poor security.

headline.seo: Police Captain in Benghazi Is Abducted
headline.main: Police Captain in Benghazi Is Abducted
